content: When I was looking at this stuff originally I didn't personally find his content all that substantive or helpful, but I didn't really look at a lot of it so don't have a strong opinion. No idea if he is genuinely self-realized or not, but I felt while others were "circling around something" he was a bit more like "walking in circles". Again, doesn't mean he doesn't know what he's talking about or that he's not helpful. As a side note, I found Alan Watts really helpful and grounding but he expressed himself to not really personally experience what he thought was being communicated.
